**Summary**
• Anthropic pays $1.5 billion to authors for using their work without permission.
• This is the first time an AI company faces major consequences for pirated training data.
• The settlement sets a precedent that AI models must respect intellectual property rights.

Impact — AI companies are now on notice: stealing data has a billion-dollar price tag.

────────────────────────────────
Link: https://arstechnica.com/tech-policy/2025/09/first-of-its-kind-ai-settlement-anthropic-to-pay-authors-1-5-billion/
